title: Memories
lyrics:
Sad songs, over and over again
Happiness is so far away
Mad love, just frustration and sin
I can’t afford this way
We are just two souls with a broken heart

We are dreamers, nothing else to say

We were young, young, a paradise in

But memories are so far away

So far away



So far away

So far away



So far away, so far away, so far away

So far away, so far away, so far away



Still wrong, over and over again

I didn’t surf wave after waves

I don’t know, what is a lovely embrace

Maybe it hurts too much the same



We are just two souls with a broken heart

We are dreamers, nothing else to say

We were young, young, a paradise in

But memories are so far away

So far away



So far away

So far away



So far away, so far away, so far away

So far away, so far away, so far away
